Primary.longdesc: Error Event: (ECG) Lead Disconnected (specialized form of the generic Disconnect. In case of ECG, some ECG devices reconstruct leads when a single lead of a multilead cable falls off. This needs a special user notification, because the situation might not be visible on the display waves Reasoning: see above)
